thread.section_title: WTSmedia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WTSmedia | www.wtsmedia.com | 2 of 6
thread.title: Anne Binette

author: Anne Binette
title: Anne Binette
text: I have been working with Larry Russell for almost 7 years and have nothing but praise for his ability and work ethic. I never worry about the product not meeting our standards and yes, he does move mountains from time to time to get product to us in a timely manner! I recommend WTS and Larry to everyone that is needing work in this arena. We will continue to rely on their prompt and professional work. Even the guys who load up DVDs in my car are helpful and kind. I can't say enough about the front-end girls either.Its a pleasure to visit WTS.
